articles.title: EY rejects TPG plan to break up Big Four firm - Financial Times
articles.description: US buyout group had proposed to take stake in consulting arm
articles.content:
EY has rejected a proposal from US private equity group TPG to break up the Big Four firm and take a stake in its consulting business, according to a statement sent to partners on Wednesday.

articles.title: Elon Musk won’t fight Mark Zuckerberg in a ‘cage match’ – because he knows he’d lose - The Guardian
